column4: why is thunderbird dependent on pyhton scripting in openoffice?
if i want to remove package pyhton-uno "Python interface for OpenOffice.org"  synaptic will remove language-support-sv, openoffice.org-help-sv, open.org-writer, thunderbord-locale-sv.se allso. why?
besides, the only way to kill all scripting support in Writer is to change in the soruce and recompile it then....?
